project_description: This dataset documents security and automation system installations for various clients, including CCTV surveillance, fire alarm systems, access control, and networking solutions. Each entry represents a unique project with different requirements and scales.

clients.description: A comprehensive security and automation project featuring multi-zone fire detection, smart parking, and gate automation. The inclusion of network cabling suggests integration with existing IT infrastructure, making it a large-scale installation for a high-security facility.
Focused on access control (automated gates) and fire safety, this project likely served a commercial or industrial site requiring zoned fire detection and secure entry management.
A high-value CCTV installation, possibly covering a large area or featuring advanced cameras (e.g., night vision, PTZ) for monitoring humanitarian facilities.
Another premium CCTV project, potentially for construction site surveillance or a high-risk area, given the contractor specialization and elevated cost.
A standard security camera system for a religious institution, likely covering entrances, worship areas, and outdoor spaces to deter theft or vandalism.
A high-end hotel surveillance system, probably including lobby, hallway, and perimeter coverage with features like facial recognition or 24/7 recording.

clients.company_name: Cistercian Monastery Mariam tsion Catholic School
clients.description: A basic CCTV setup for a school-monitoring classrooms, entrances, and playgrounds to ensure student safety and asset protection.

clients.company_name: Capital Cement milling and Packing PLC.
clients.description: An industrial-grade camera system for a cement plant, likely dust-proof and weather-resistant, to monitor production lines and storage areas.
A mid-range CCTV installation for an unspecified facility (possibly an office or institution), balancing coverage and image quality.
A small-scale camera system, potentially for limited-area monitoring in an industrial setting like a warehouse or loading dock.
A workforce management solution (time attendance system) for tracking employee hours, likely integrated with payroll in an agricultural processing facility.
An intercom system installation, possibly for a residential complex or small business requiring internal communication and access control.

A multi-system project for a government agency (Oromia Skill Verification Agency), combining security (CCTV), climate control (AC), and audio (sound system) for a modern office or training facility in Adama.
